text:
Our Tomcat servers receive many frequent requests (e.g., heartbeat/keep-alive)
that do not need to be logged.  I would like the be able to provide the
AccessLogValve with a list of URIs which should not be logged.  For example:

<Valve className="org.apache.catalina.valves.AccessLogValve"
   directory="logs"  prefix="access_log." suffix=""
   ignoreURI="/ignore-me.html,/ignore_this.jsp"
   pattern="common" resolveHosts="false"/>

The ignoreURI attribute is a comma-delimited list of URIs.

See (soon-to-be) attached patch.
creator: mheinrichs@rogers.com
